summary: This is an email chain from July 15, 2019, forwarding a document titled '2019 Right of Access (Epstein).pdf'. The sender notes the document is 'not super relevant to Reporters Committee' but provides the latest word on the subject of public access rights.

persons.name: Skotko
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of an email forwarding a document related to public access rights in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: An email dated July 15, 2019, discusses a document titled '2019 Right of Access (Epstein).pdf'.
The document is described as providing 'the latest word on the subject of right of public access' related to the Epstein case.
The sender indicates the document is 'not super relevant to Reporters Committee', suggesting it was being circulated among media or legal professionals.
